Entries.default: "This takes me back to my days aboard the Turgid Trousers. Basically an orgy ship."
"Now THIS is my true calling! Gentlemen, ladies, who wants to pet the handsome fish?!"
"These people don't look like they've seen a walking statue, do they?"
"Why do you always bring me to brothels, Watcher? Why?"
"The Sorcerer rented out the whole Mare once. Heh. That were a night and a half. Literally."
"Bet I could do that just as good... if I tried."
"D'ye think they'll give us a turn on stage?"
"Ke ni kek tenasa uhuku... mapan kepak yeyi!"
